introduction: Born in 1994 and based in Lyon, France, I am a curious programmer, constantly on the lookout for new ideas to create a more aesthetic, enjoyable and high-performance Web experience
I am looking for a long-term collaboration with a company that will appreciate the investment I put in both client-side and server-side programming.

text: Definitely reconverted in 2022, I have always been a great computer enthusiast. When I was younger, this interest was expressed through small projects in Python, but it soon became an addiction to learning new skills, be they related to the Web, operating system, or in related fields such as 3D graphics and network architectures.

I specialize in building static websites using the fundamental technologies, but also in designing more complex web applications, which require skills in more modern or advanced technologies. I am pragmatic when it comes to choosing the tools I use as I am also aware that the most popular technologies are overused and don't always meet needs.
I plan to concentrate my learning around 3D and Web Assembly technologies, so that I can create unique Web experiences, while taking into account the performance and robustness of the code.
